channel.title: News on Air-Sea Modeling Lab. Yonsei Univ.
channel.description: Recent content in News on Air-Sea Modeling Lab. Yonsei Univ.

item.title: Webpage_update
item.description: We made a major update of the lab webpage so that the pagination works well for the “News” section. It is built based on the theme called Airspace. Photos are mainly from NASA Goddard Flickr page, a vorticity field that Ryan Abernathey created using the MITgcm llc4320 simulation and other online places.

item.title: New webpage
item.description: Launching a new webpage We are please to launch the first webpage of the Air-Sea Modeling Lab. Please come and check our research and accomplishments.

item.title: Laboratory Open
item.description: Air-Sea Modeling Laboratory (ASML) open Air-Sea Modeling Laboratory(ASML) is opened
